Purpose: To aid in the diagnosis and management of autoimmune disorders, particularly ankylosing spondylitis, by determining the presence of the HLA-B27 antigen.
Container: EDTA (lavender top) or ACD (yellow top) tube
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, sequence-specific oligonucleotide (SSO) probe or HLA-B27 typing kit, DNA extraction system, flow cytometer (if applicable), agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus
